MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to dissemminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

English.Keywords: batch, CHOICE, wizard, dialog, shell, enhancement, batch programming, interactive
English.Char_Desc_45: Show Windows dialog boxes from a script
English.Char_Desc_80: Show Windows dialog boxes from a script.
English.Char_Desc_250: The Wizard's Apprentice is an application that allows you to ask questions from a script. It uses Windows dialog boxes in the so-called Wizard style: dialogs asking one question at a time, with a Back button, a Next button and a Cancel button.
English.Char_Desc_450: The Wizard's Apprentice is an application that allows you to ask questions from a script. It uses Windows dialog boxes in the so-called Wizard style: dialogs asking one question at a time, with a Back button, a Next button and a Cancel button. A comprehensive manual, including programming techniques to get the most out of the Wizard's Apprentice is included. Source code (in C) is also available.
English.Char_Desc_2000: The Wizard's Apprentice is an application that allows you to ask questions from a script. It uses Windows dialog boxes in the so-called Wizard style: dialogs asking one question at a time, with a Back button, a Next button and a Cancel button. A comprehensive manual, including programming techniques to get the most out of the Wizard's Apprentice is included. Source code (in C) is also available.
